text: The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland is a 1999 video game. In this game, Elmo loses his blanket and both the blanket and Elmo end up in Grouchland. It was released in October 1999 in the United States. It is based on the movie of the same name. It was made for Windows. It was also released on the Game Boy Color in October 1999. == Release dates == ===Game Boy Color=== Country Release October 1999 == References == Category:1999 video games Category:Sesame Street Category:Educational video games Category:Game Boy Color games Category:Single-player video games Category:Ubisoft games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games
title: The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland (video game)
